scripts.dev: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist && cp -r icons dist && tsc src/background.ts src/contentScript.ts --outDir dist && parcel watch src/index.html --dist-dir dist --no-cache
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist && cp -r icons dist && tsc src/background.ts src/contentScript.ts --outDir dist && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --no-cache
